title: Bramble Recipe
full_text:
Bramble Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
gin
(Plymouth recommended)
3/4
ounce
fresh lemon juice
1/2
ounce
simple syrup
3/4
ounce
creme de mure
(
blackberry liqueur
)
Directions
Combine gin, lemon, and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake until very well-chilled, then strain into a rocks glass with ice (preferably crushed ice). Float the creme de mure on top. Garnish with a blackberry.
Special equipment
Cocktail shaker, cocktail strainer
Gin
Summer Drinks
